english.segment1: The hidden room inside the heart. You keep the things IÂ’ve broken. The silence of the guilty soul. Leaves our fears unspoken. You are no stranger here. So you are holding
english.segment2: All things, all things, all things are in your hands X2
english.segment3: The longing in an orphans smile. The beauty of the baggers reach. The roads you paved with blood and tears. is where you are calling us to be .. there are no stranger here. Father show was
english.segment4: All things, all things, all things are in your hands X2. God is beautiful. Christ is wonderful. All things, all things, all things are in your hands X2
english.segment5: No live, no dead, to keep you away to keep you away. To keep you away. (repeat)
english.segment6: No doubt no shame. to Keep us away
